title: Americas Serial Killers = Portraits In Evil
description:
2 DVD set of Americas Serial Killers Portraits In Evil 2009

Its a big set and i know people will probably complain about the size but the dvd kinda looked liked old vhs tape documenterys to me so i didnt want to downgrade any further. It Looks Pretty Good Now But it is 4.3 aspec ratio as that was how the dvd was made 

Must see if you into this kinda thing as i am, Very good and entertaining footage plus some bonus clips of pictures of serial killers and drawings by serial killers

DVD 1
1 The Monsters Within And Among Us
2 Killers Without Concience
3 The Bogeymans Gonna Eat You
4 Serial Killing Begins Again
5 Men Who Like To Kill

DVD 2
6 Homosexual Serial Killers
7 Buddy Serial Killing
8 The Many Faces Of Serial Killing
9 To Catch A Serial Killer
10 Why Serial Killers Kill

Bonus 
Pictures Of Serial Killers
Drawings By Serial Killers
===================================[p0tzer]===================================		


Not my torrent originally.    This is a greatgive thanks to the original uploader and not me.
   Torrent appears to need a reseed...needs some interest re-generated in this great torrent.


And if the original uploader is reading this: thanks a million, bud.


Apologies, but I hope you don't mind me re-seeding a torrent that was yours.


Regards, nightissuchproximity
